resources.string: Sopetran is part of the trilogy of the Ruta del Sol in western Antioquia. After the opening of the tunnel of the West Fernando Gomez Martinez, their tourist possibilities have tripled from the year 2006. It is a land suitable for ecotourism.
The journey that makes the wagon is 760 meters at a height of 340 meters and the travel time is about 7 minutes.
Known as the "Antioquian Macondo" for its beautiful architecture of typical buildings of the paisa ambience of yesteryear.
Located in the eastern part of the main park of the municipality, this trail leads to the icy waters of the "Nevera"
Facilities in the countryside, surrounded by nature with all the beauty and tranquility that you need
Our commitment is to excellence in nustros services. We wish to make your travel experience, a real pleasant experience and a fond memory
It is a modern country hotel, which offers an intimate, inspiring presence that is paid by the good design and privacy
